title: Breaking Bad
creator: Vince Gilligan
description: Breaking Bad follows a high school chemistry teacher who turns to manufacturing drugs after being diagnosed with cancer.

title: Game of Thrones
creator: David Benioff & D.B. Weiss
description: Game of Thrones is an epic fantasy series that chronicles the struggle for power among noble families in the fictional land of Westeros.

title: Stranger Things
creator: The Duffer Brothers
description: Stranger Things centers around a group of children who encounter supernatural forces and secret experiments in their small town.

title: The Office
creator: Greg Daniels
description: The Office is a mockumentary sitcom that depicts the everyday work lives of employees in a paper company.

title: Sherlock
creator: Steven Moffat & Mark Gatiss
description: Sherlock is a modern adaptation of Sherlock Holmes, solving complex crimes in contemporary London.
